mapper.select: SELECT xt_quartz_log_id, xt_quartz_log_name, xt_quartz_log_key, xt_quartz_log_content, xt_quartz_log_ctime, xt_quartz_log_etime, xt_userinfo_id, xt_quartz_log_flag FROM xt_quartz_log WHERE xt_quartz_log_id=#{xt_quartz_log_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO xt_quartz_log ( xt_quartz_log_id, xt_quartz_log_name, xt_quartz_log_key, xt_quartz_log_content, xt_quartz_log_ctime, xt_quartz_log_etime, xt_userinfo_id, xt_quartz_log_flag ) VALUES ( #{xt_quartz_log_id}, #{xt_quartz_log_name}, #{xt_quartz_log_key}, #{xt_quartz_log_content}, #{xt_quartz_log_ctime}, #{xt_quartz_log_etime}, #{xt_userinfo_id}, #{xt_quartz_log_flag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE xt_quartz_log SET xt_quartz_log_name = #{xt_quartz_log_name}, xt_quartz_log_key = #{xt_quartz_log_key}, xt_quartz_log_content = #{xt_quartz_log_content}, xt_quartz_log_ctime = #{xt_quartz_log_ctime}, xt_quartz_log_etime = #{xt_quartz_log_etime}, xt_userinfo_id = #{xt_userinfo_id}, xt_quartz_log_flag = #{xt_quartz_log_flag} WHERE xt_quartz_log_id=#{xt_quartz_log_id}

UPDATE xt_quartz_log
xt_quartz_log_name = #{xt_quartz_log_name},
xt_quartz_log_key = #{xt_quartz_log_key},
xt_quartz_log_content = #{xt_quartz_log_content},
xt_quartz_log_etime = #{xt_quartz_log_etime},
xt_userinfo_id = #{xt_userinfo_id},
xt_quartz_log_flag = #{xt_quartz_log_flag},
WHERE xt_quartz_log_id=#{xt_quartz_log_id}
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM xt_quartz_log WHERE xt_quartz_log_id IN
#{item}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO xt_quartz_log ( xt_quartz_log_id, xt_quartz_log_name, xt_quartz_log_key, xt_quartz_log_content, xt_quartz_log_ctime, xt_userinfo_id, xt_quartz_log_flag ) VALUES
( #{item.xt_quartz_log_id}, #{item.xt_quartz_log_name}, #{item.xt_quartz_log_key}, #{item.xt_quartz_log_content}, #{item.xt_quartz_log_ctime}, #{item.xt_userinfo_id}, #{item.xt_quartz_log_flag} )

update.foreach: UPDATE xt_quartz_log SET xt_quartz_log_name = #{item.xt_quartz_log_name}, xt_quartz_log_key = #{item.xt_quartz_log_key}, xt_quartz_log_content = #{item.xt_quartz_log_content}, xt_quartz_log_etime = #{item.xt_quartz_log_etime}, xt_userinfo_id = #{item.xt_userinfo_id}, xt_quartz_log_flag = #{item.xt_quartz_log_flag} WHERE xt_quartz_log_id=#{item.xt_quartz_log_id}

UPDATE xt_quartz_log
xt_quartz_log_name = #{item.xt_quartz_log_name},
xt_quartz_log_key = #{item.xt_quartz_log_key},
xt_quartz_log_content = #{item.xt_quartz_log_content},
xt_quartz_log_etime = #{item.xt_quartz_log_etime},
xt_userinfo_id = #{item.xt_userinfo_id},
xt_quartz_log_flag = #{item.xt_quartz_log_flag},
WHERE xt_quartz_log_id=#{item.xt_quartz_log_id}
